Teaser: As one of the Greater Toronto Area's largest independent pre-owned Saab dealers, Beacon Motors has helped thousands of customers obtain the Saab of their choice. Since 1989, Beacon Motors has placed a premium on customers' driving pleasure and a peace of mind. What that translates into is the highest quality of service that keeps your Saab in mint condition, letting you get the most out of your vehicle. The dealer principal Rick Lee and his hand-picked team of professional staff are here to assist you with any concerns that you may have. Every client who walks through the doors of Beacon Motors can count on reliable service that goes above and beyond to satisfy every automotive need. Our friendly and courteous staff members are here to assist you with service, parts and with our pristine pre-owned vehicles.
